original: Simple squamous epithelium is a type of tissue characterized by a single layer of flat cells. The cells of this epithelium are tightly packed together, forming a thin barrier. This thinness enables the rapid diffusion of substances through the tissue, facilitating the exchange of gases, nutrients, and waste products across cell membranes. The nuclei of squamous cells are centrally located, allowin
